casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Trustee FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDERS OF THE CWABS, INC., ASSET-BACKED CERTIFICATES SERIES 2004-12, Respondent
v.
Jeffrey L. GOSS, Petitioner No. 2 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 13, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 14th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
